answers.answer: Hello,Is your wife on medications for PCOS? Spotting before expected date of periods could be due to implantation bleeding secondary to pregnancy. Other causes of spotting before periods are hormonal imbalances, infections of the female reproductive tract, polyps, fibroids etc.Diarrhea and constipation could be due to any gastrointestinal infection, food allergy, food intolerance, irritable bowel syndrome etc.Fatty liver grade 1 can be seen in obesity, high lipid profile, diabetes mellitus .If she is obese she should control her weight. All you can do is wait for her periods. If she misses her periods take up pregnancy test. Visit a gynecologist for more queries and assistance. Do keep me posted.Take care and regards!

question: I'M Dr. Ritseh, my wife is having PCOS, and had her spontaneous periods on 8 july 2013 after 2 and a half years. Now she is pain all over her abdomen, back and legs along with headache. She also had spotting from 24th july and 26th july with the discharge.  now she is suffering from pain in right upper quadrant and breasts off and on. on 30th she had diahhroea 7 times follwed by once on 31 july and after that on 1 aug she has been suffering from conspitation, She also has Grdae I fatty liver changes as per US done on 14 July 2013. Kindly help us know what all could it be? Is it pregnancy ??
title: TRYING TO CONCEIVE
